gov.nih.nlm.ling.brat

Class ModificationAnnotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.brat.AbstractAnnotation
      • gov.nih.nlm.ling.brat.ModificationAnnotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotation, java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>

    public class ModificationAnnotation
extends AbstractAnnotation
    The class to represent an event modification annotation, such as speculation, negation, or factuality.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      • exactMatch

        public boolean exactMatch(Annotation annotation1)
        Checks whether the event modification annotation matches exactly another annotation by checking the type, event argument and value if possible
        Parameters:
        annotation1 - annotation to compare with
        Returns:
        true if exact match

      • approximateMatch

        public boolean approximateMatch(Annotation annotation1)
        Same as exactMatch(Annotation).
        Parameters:
        annotation1 - the annotation to compare
        Returns:
        true if the annotations are an approximate match

      • referenceMatch

        public boolean referenceMatch(boolean approximateMatch,
                              Annotation annotation1)
        The same as exactMatch(Annotation) or approximateMatch(Annotation), depending on the approximateMatch parameter.
        Parameters:
        approximateMatch - true if the underlying comparison will be based on approximate matching
        annotation1 - the annotation to compare
        Returns:
        true if the annotations are a reference match

      • spanMatch

        public boolean spanMatch(Annotation a)
        The same as approximate match.
        Parameters:
        a - the annotation to compare
        Returns:
        true if the annotations are a span match
